extendedInfo.description: Been kicked out of the pub and want to have another drink but you don't know where?Bumped into a friend randomly and feel like going out but you haven't got a plan?Party mood got you in the street but you don't know what's going in the area?Gone to the wrong place? Give you a second chance!Want to impress a friend with a non planned night out? These are the best ones!HaveFunHub app helps you with that.

reviews.title: A great app!
reviews.comment: It really works! Now I can use my phone to find out where the party is at! And it even tells me how the party is and shows me pics of it. It\'s a must have!
reviews.author: Martin Tesselhoff

reviews.title: Brixton market
reviews.comment: Very simple to use and fun...got lost in the market checking live music I found through this service. That\'s all you need. Loving it. Keep the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User
